homeHeader.title: Create, Collaborate, & Scale Your Media Venture Seamlessly in Fujairah Creative City with One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Streamline your licensing application, secure bank account approvals, and stay compliant stress-free with our end-to-end business setup solutions in Fujairah Creative City Free Zone. Live, work, and thrive in the region’s media clusters designed to empower creatives with strategic access to global markets and exciting growth opportunities.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Why should I set up or expand my business in Fujairah Creative City?
items.answer: FCC Free Zone boasts a vibrant culture, competitive tax benefits, full profits repatriation, and world-class infrastructure.

items.question: How long does it take to get licensed in Fujairah Creative City?
items.answer: It generally takes 1-7 working days to secure your FCC license and set up your business.

items.question: Can I set up my business in Fujairah Creative City FZ remotely?
items.answer: Yes, Fujairah Creative City offers 100% remote business set up solutions, empowering you to launch your creative ventures from any corner of the world.

items.question: What are the different types of business structure allowed in FCC FZ?
items.answer: The FCC Free Zone allows businesses to choose from a variety of legal entities, including branch of a foreign or UAE company, free zone company, and free zone establishment.

items.question: How many business activities can I choose from in Fujairah Free Zone?
items.answer: You can choose from 2,000+ business activities, including medical, media, communication, travel, hotel supplies, aviation, and more.
